messages.subject: Lost in SC  Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: One Lurker Says Hi
messages.msgSnippet: ** He can call ME and I ll pick him up! Feed him too! ~Kelly**   THanks Kelly!  He probably would have really appreciated that!  I should have posted this
messages.messageBody:
** He can call ME and I'll pick him up! Feed
him too!

~Kelly**

<BG> THanks Kelly! He probably would have really appreciated that! I
should have posted this earlier! He's home now!! Well, actually he's now
at work but he made it back. I am truly hopeless when it comes to reading a
map. I'm getting better though so maybe there's a ray of hope there
somewhere.

The good thing about him getting lost is he now knows EXACTLY where the
conference and the hotel are! LOL And I could probably navigate Columbia
having never even been there. <g>

Jennifer
